Rdatdota 0.0.1

Unique Heroes

Source: R/get_player_unique.R
get_player_unique.Rd

A list of players and the unique heroes they have used

get_player_unique(patch = "7.19", split = "lan",
  after = "2011.01.01", before = "2018.07.12", duration = "0-100",
  leagues = NULL, tier = "1&2&3", valve = "does-not-matter",
  teams = NULL, players = NULL, roles = NULL)

Arguments

patch

Which patches are you interested in? From 6.74 to 7.20. (Connected by "&")
split

What type of event was it? Choose from "online", "lan" or "post-event".
after

The beginning date of the match
before

The last day of the period to search
duration

The time the game lasts (measured in minutes)
leagues

What league is it in? Check the serial number of the league on www.datdota.com.
tier

What tier of event is this? 1 = Premium; 2 = Professional; 3 = Semi-pro; (Connected by "&")
valve

Is this a Valve event? Choose from "yes", "no" or "does-not-matter".
teams

Teams to serch for. Check the serial number of the players on www.datdota.com. (Connected by "&". At least one must appear)
players

Players to search for. Check the serial number of the players on www.datdota.com. (Connected by "&". Can be null.)
roles

What role was it played? Choose from "core" or "support". (Connected by "&". Can be null.)

Value

A dota_api object containing the elements described in the details.

Details

A list will be returned that contains three elements. The content, the url and the response received from the api.

The content element of the list contains a sub list called data. Following informations are included: nickname, steamId, heroes (list), countUnique, gameCount.

  • steamID: The steam ID of the player.

  • nickname: The nickname of the player.

  • heroes: A list of unique heroes that the player have played.

  • countUnique: The number of unique heroes that the player have used.

  • gameCount: Total nuber of games.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_player_unique()
get_player_unique(patch = "7.19", split = "lan", after = "2011.01.01", before = "2018.07.12",
                  duration = "0-100", leagues = NULL, tier = "1&2&3", valve = "does-not-matter",
                  teams = "15", players = "106863163", roles = "core")
# }
